name: Touhou Cacophony of Myths
description:
Download the executable and run it to begin.

Simply press any button on the Keyboard to continue through the slides and dialog.

Once you reach the green screen, that's the end.

Info for diffrent mosters loosly form wikipedia, namely

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnacon
